Homepage

Climate and Air Pollution Synergies Assessment Model (CAPSAM)

Welcome to CAPSAM. A quick and simple model designed to assess how future decarbonisation scenarios will impact air quality.

Fill in the boxes below to more accurately specific your scenario to improve CAPSAM’s output and input your scenario data.

What country is your scenario looking at?

countries <- c("UK", "England", "Wales", "Scotland", "Northern Ireland")

library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  
  selectInput("countries", "Which country/region is your scenario looking at?", choices = countries)
  ## radioButtons("countries", "Country: ", countries)
  )

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

What air quality impacts do you intend to look at? E.g. Impacts of UK pollutant emissions on UK, or England emissions on Wales etc.

impact_factor_choice <- c("UK", "England", "Wales", "Scotland", "Northern Ireland")


library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  selectInput("impactCountry", "Choose Impacted Region:", choices = impact_factor_choice),
  ## radioButtons("impactCountry", "Choose Impacted Region", impact_factor_choice)
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

What units of energy are used within your selected scenario?

Do you wish to investigate impacts of sector electrification and hydrogen usage?

If yes, do you have data for hydrogen production and electricity generation available? General assumptions will be provided if not.
